history.content: We haven't started to do the hiring for the Fall semester in terms of sending out the offers. I don't know whether that means that 162 is also waiting to conduct interviews. You might want to ask Glenna Anton, ganton [at] berkeley [dot] edu if she knows anything about the course staff, or you could try sending mail to the instructor and asking.

children.subject: Same here. Can you let me know if you find out more?

history.content:
I filled out the application + supplement to be on 162 course staff for TA & tutor positions, and haven’t heard back any next steps at this point. 

I read some other posts where it stated that fall hiring wouldn’t be confirmed until later— does this includes having been reached out to interviews, etc? Trying to figure out if I should cut my losses about not having been contacted at this point
history.subject: 162 course staff?
